## Description {#details}

Option class for critical edge splitting.

This provides a builder interface for overriding the default options used during critical edge splitting.

Definition at line 145 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-h">BasicBlockUtils.h</a>.

### PreserveLoopSimplify {#aa49c1cc9b14d9bb63aff235f1c0830f8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::CriticalEdgeSplittingOptions::PreserveLoopSimplify = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/basicaliasanalysis-cpp/#af6d5cafbdfc5313e65d990120021a3ec">true</a></>}>
SplitCriticalEdge is guaranteed to preserve loop-simplify form if LI is provided.

If it cannot be preserved, no splitting will take place. If it is not set, preserve loop-simplify form if possible.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-h/#l00157">157</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/utils/basicblockutils-h">BasicBlockUtils.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
